data.name: Survival Ball - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Survival Ball - Soundtrack (OST) includes 18 tracks in MP3 192kb/s format from the game, the trailer theme and previously unreleased tracks specifically composed for the game.

Tracklist:
01 - Main Screen - Intro (00:19)
02 - Main Screen - Loop (01:07)
03 - Main Screen Alternate Theme - Intro (00:22)
04 - Main Screen Alternate Theme - Loop (02:17)
05 - RocketX - Intro (00:03)
06 - RocketX - Loop (01:49)
07 - Venom Rig - Intro (00:17)
08 - Venom Rig - Loop (01:36)
09 - Unfair Fair - Intro (00:32)
10 - Unfair Fair - Loop (01:04)
11 - Hex Elevator (Loopable) (01:36)
12 - Big Giant Head (Loopable) (00:53)
13 - Tutorial - Background Ambience (01:29)
14 - Extra - Trailer (01:07)
15 - Extra - Unfair Fair Alternate Theme 1 - Intro (00:32)
16 - Extra - Unfair Fair Alternate Theme 1 - Loop (01:04)
17 - Extra - Unfair Fair Alternate Theme 2 - Intro (00:32)
18 - Extra - Unfair Fair Alternate Theme 2 - Loop (00:48)

Songs will be downloaded to the Survival Ball - Soundtrack folder inside the game's Steam directory:
Windows: […]/Steam/steamapps/common/SurvivalBall/Survival Ball - Soundtrack
macOS: /Users/[your_username]/Library/Application Support/Steam/SteamApps/common/SurvivalBall/Survival Ball - Soundtrack

data.short_description: Survival Ball - Soundtrack includes 18 tracks in MP3 format from the game, the trailer theme and previously unreleased tracks specifically composed for the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any system capable of playing MP3 files

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any system capable of playing MP3 files
